item.title: Openstack - How To Attach To An Autoscaling Group Or An Arbitrary Group Of Nodes
item.description: In order to use a load balancer with an autoscaling group- we should use a nested stack to achieve. We can define the AutoScaling Group and LoadBalancer pool in the top level template.
